getLanguageProfile

public static java.lang.String getLanguageProfile(java.lang.String native_language,
                                                  java.lang.String language_being_learned,
                                                  java.lang.String type)
This method returns a profile for native speakers learning a specific language needing a reading or writing function. It setup for only English and Korean speakers at this time.

Parameters:
language_being_learned -
type -
Returns:
a JuksongConstants for this specific combination of languages.

ratePerformancebyColor

public java.awt.Color ratePerformancebyColor(Word word,
                                             java.lang.String type_wanted)
Go thru a words tests and create a color based on the words testing performance. For a passed tests, the green componant is increased by a multiple of the level of that passed test. For a failed test, the red component is increased by a multiple of the level of that test level.

Parameters:
word -
type_wanted -
Returns:
